document.full_text: chinese police have arrested prominent writer ran yunfei for challenging the ruling communist party, people close to the blogger said on monday, the latest in a string of arrests in a deepening crackdown on dissent.
document.title: prominent chinese blogger charged as crackdown deepens
lines_and_colors: chinese police have arrested prominent writer ran yunfei for challenging the ruling communist party, people close to the blogger said on monday, the latest in a string of arrests in a deepening crackdown on dissent.
